activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11155
activity.text: Hey @abhimanyurajeesh do you want me to get rid of the scroll in the table so that it matches the actual printed ouput? Can you guide me with your approach to do it so I can try and make some tweaks?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11155
activity.text:
Hey @Tanuj1718 , For tables in medical prescriptions and treatment summaries, I kept horizontal scrolling because forcing them to fit within a small screen (e.g., 500x800) would make the text too small and unreadable at some times. I think keeping a scroll for the table is necessary when it comes to smaller mobile screens. Do let me know your thoughts on that.

cc: @abhimanyurajeesh
